jei.info.ad_astra_giselle_addon.gravity_:
Normalizes gravity on other planets.
Can cover up to %1$s blocks.
jei.info.ad_astra_giselle_addon.fuel_loa:
Can receive '%2$s' tagged fluid.
Then sends fuel to nearby 'Rovers' and 'Rockets' within %1$s blocks.
config.ad_astra_giselle_addon.machines.f: Blocks from Engine Fuel Transmitter to each direction
Gives engine fuel to 'Rovers' and 'Rockets' nearby
enchantment.ad_astra_giselle_addon.space:
Can breath on planets with no Oxygen
Use energy or durability
Requires 'Oxygen Can' in inventory
description.ad_astra_giselle_addon.space:
Can breath on planets with no Oxygen
Will also fill held item with oxygen when in rain or water
Requires 'Oxygen Can' in inventory
pneumaticcraft.gui.tab.info.item.armor.g:
Can breath on planets with no Oxygen
Requires 'Oxygen Can' in inventory
enchantment.ad_astra_giselle_addon.space:
No damage from fire on other planets
Uses energy or durability
enchantment.ad_astra_giselle_addon.acid_:
No damage from acid rain on other planets
Uses energy or durability
enchantment.ad_astra_giselle_addon.gravi:
Normalizes gravity on other planets
Uses energy or durability
description.ad_astra_giselle_addon.space: No damage from fire on other planets
description.ad_astra_giselle_addon.acid_: No damage from acid rain on other planets
pneumaticcraft.gui.tab.info.item.armor.g: No damage from fire on other planets

item.ad_astra_giselle_addon.rocket_senso: Outputs near Rocket's state as redstone signal through Comparator
jei.info.ad_astra_giselle_addon.rocket_s:
Finds Rocket within %1$s blocks.
Then outputs that Rocket's state as redstone signal through Comparator.
Signal type can be changed in the GUI.
